Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 174th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2014...
Injured on 7/27/2014 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...

Injured on 8/16/2016 with a Bruised Finger, out for 4 days...
Injured on 4/22/2017 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Traded from Philadelphia to Kansas City on 6/20/2018 (Going to PHI: 3B Marten Gasparini, P James Gilley, P Adam Conley. Going to KC: LF Bill Taylor, P Robert Masson)...
Injured on 7/12/2018 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/17/2018 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/17/2018 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 9/11/2018, off Danny Hultzen (CLE)...
Injured on 8/21/2019 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2019, hitting .277 with 9 HR, 55 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2021, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,371,429 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Minnesota on 4/7/2022...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,642,857 through salary arbitration...
